Class Vickery_UI

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Vickery_UI
public class Vickery_UI
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a user interface to the Drawing class, which lets users draw shapes. This version supports two subclasses of Drawing: CDrawing (command "new") and GDrawing (command "win").

Version:
1.2 -- March 16, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Interactively reads commands from the user, or from script files, interpreting them as they are read.
Parameters:
argv - The names of one or more script files.
Returns:
void
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading from a a script or from the user.

processCommands

public static void processCommands(java.io.BufferedReader br,
                                   boolean doPrompt)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Reads commands from a BufferedReader and interprets them.
Parameters:
br - The BufferedReader to read commands from.
doPrompt - True if a prompt is to be displayed before reading each command.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading commands.
